programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Key to a Great Comeback Escape! The Wax-Wax Ball!

programme.title: Crocodile snatches Vivi off the back of a giant crab, but Luffy’s not having it. The rubber-man goes toe-to-toe with the sandman in a battle that will end in bloodshed.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Merciless Mortal Combat! Luffy vs Crocodile

programme.title: Crocodile puts Luffy down for a never-ending dirt nap, and the Straw Hats get a lift from a crabby ally in their race to stop the looming rebellion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dash For a Miracle! Alabasta Animal Land

programme.title: Vivi arrives in Alubarna with just enough time to stop the rebellion, but the agents of Baroque Works lurk in every corner, waiting to sabotage her plans for peace.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Rebel Army vs. Royal Army! Showdown at Alubarna

programme.title: Sanji buys Vivi some time by mixing it up with a foe of many faces. Outside Alubarna’s walls, Chopper and Usopp tangle with Miss Merry Christmas and her slugging sidekick.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Alubarna Grieves! The Fierce Captain Karoo

programme.title: Usopp finally shows some courage by using a five-ton hammer to play whack-a-mole with Miss Merry Christmas. He may be bluffing, but the distraction lets Chopper zero in on the enemy’s weakness.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sworn on a Friend's Dream! The Battle of Molehill, Block 4

programme.title: Chopper’s Rumble Ball could be the difference between life and death in the mole ballgame. Elsewhere, Sanji has trouble kicking a pretty enemy, and Vivi proposes something unthinkable.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Big Opening Day Today! The Copy-Copy Montage

programme.title: Vivi continues preparations to blow up the palace; Zorro puts his steel to the test against a lethal blade-man; Sanji tries to overcome his inability to kick a foxy lady!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Transformed into Nami! Bon Clay's Rapid-Fire Ballet Kenpo!

programme.title: Things don’t look good for the prettiest Straw Hat. Nami’s about to tangle with a thorny adversary, and the weapon Usopp built her is only good for party tricks!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's Cyclone Advisory! Clima Tact Burst!

programme.title: Crocodile reveals his sinister motives for attacking Alabasta, and Nami tries to end her duel with Miss Doublefinger by unleashing the Clima Tact’s ultimate weapon: a devastatingly lethal tornado!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Secret Passed Down In The Royal Family! The Ancient Weapon Pluton!

programme.title: Zoro hopes to attain a new level of strength when he fights a foe with a body made of blades. The Straw Hat sword-slinger is determined to become a man who can cut steel – or die trying.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Secret Of Powerful Swordplay! Ability To Cut Steel And The Rhythm Things Have!

programme.title: Koza – the leader of the rebel army – finally discovers the evil mastermind behind Alabasta’s drought, but is he too late to prevent further bloodshed?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle is Over! Koza Raises the White Flag!

programme.title: When Koza is mysteriously shot, the rebellion is reborn, but Vivi’s cries for a cease-fire fall on deaf ears until a long-overdue hero swoops to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Where Vivi's Voice Gets Heard! The Hero Descends!

programme.title: Luffy finally discovers the secret to knocking out a sandman, but it won’t matter unless Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hats can locate the Baroque Works bomber.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sand Croc and Water Luffy!... The Second Round of the Duel!

programme.title: While his mates search for a bomb, Luffy narrowly survives his second scrape with Crocodile. Across town, Nico Robin strong-arms Cobra into revealing his country’s greatest secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: That Looks Croc-ish!... Luffy, Run to the Royal Tomb!

programme.title: With the walls crumbling down around them, Crocodile attacks Luffy with a poisoned pirate hook. Meanwhile, Vivi draws a bead on the bombers, but can she stop them in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Draws Near!... This is the Sand-Sand Clan's Secret Base

programme.title: The Straw Hats team up to give Vivi one last shot at disarming the bomb that threatens to destroy her city. She succeeds in cutting the fuse, but Crocodile has a backup plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magnificent Wings! My Name is Pell, Guardian Deity of the Country

programme.title: Pell’s sacrifice spares his beloved city, but only an act of god can stop the rebellion. With Crocodile’s poison coursing through his body, Luffy musters a final attack against Alabasta’s oppressor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls in Alabasta.

programme.title: Crocodile is defeated, the rain has returned to Alabasta, and Vivi’s people are eager to rebuild their kingdom. As for the Straw Hats, they have a fleet of marines breathing down their necks.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and Different Ideas of Justice!

programme.title: Now that the rebellion is over, Vivi must make an important decision about her future. The Straw Hats are ready to hoist the anchor, but an ambiguous villain has stolen the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pirates' Banquet And Operation Escape From Alabasta!

programme.title: Mr. 2 is a man of many faces, but he finally shows his true colors when the marines attack the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, Vivi has a scheme up her sleeve, and it involves Igaram wearing a dress.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It All Started On That Day...! Vivi Tells The Story Of Her Adventure!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew watch Alabasta fade into the distance, but there’s no time for reminiscing. The marines are in hot pursuit, and there’s a stowaway aboard the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Scent of danger! The seventh member is Nico Robin!

programme.title: Fresh off their adventure Alabasta, the Straw Hats discover an isolated island where they can restock their food supply. Chopper is left to guard the ship, but he and Nico spend the afternoon exploring instead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First Patient! The Untold Story Of The Rumble Ball!

programme.title: When a mail-order salesman gets lost at sea, Nami finds the paper she needs to start making maps. If the Straw Hat crew can somehow manage to survive a deadly cyclone, she might actually get some use out of it!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Uprising of the Navigator! For the Unyielding Dream!

programme.title: Heavy fog leads to a close encounter of the culinary kind when Nico fishes a marine out of the drink. The aspiring chef is concerned about the quality of his curry, and Sanji is just the guy to refine his recipe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Recipe Handed Down! Sanji, the Iron Man of Curry

programme.title: A break in the rain provides the perfect opportunity for Usopp to help a young girl fulfill her dream of launching the world’s largest firework.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Make It Bloom! Usopp The Man And The Eight-Foot Shell!

programme.title: Money troubles force Zoro to tangle with Dick the Bandit and his treacherous gang of thugs. These gun-toting outlaws are terrorizing a peaceful village, and the Straw Hat swordsman aims to stop their reign of terror!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fabled Pirate Hunter! Zoro, The Wandering Swordsman

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.
programme.sub-title: Bet on the Monaco Grand Prix!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.
programme.sub-title: The Great Chase in San Francisco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees…
programme.sub-title: Big Adventure of the Caribbean Sea

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Black Panther, the world's largest emerald, gets its name from the black panther that appears inside it when a light shines on it at a particular angle. After capturing this one-of-a-kind emerald, Lupin hides it in a museum to retrieve it later…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vault maker Marukin Safe Company is forced into bankruptcy after Lupin cracks open their impenetrable safes. To test his own skills, Marukin's son challenges Lupin to open a safe he has designed…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: While trying to snag General Hatler's prize medallion, which contains a fifty-carat ruby, Lupin inadvertently reels in Hatler's biggest secret, his toupee! An enraged General Hatler orders Lupin and his gang to be killed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Upon returning to Japan, Goemon finds his master on the brink of death. Furthermore, Jinkuro, a fellow disciple, had stolen half of the scroll containing the Secret Arts of the Iga Ninja. Will Goemon be able to avenge his master?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are in a remote area pursing a mysterious treasure, when they save a woman being chased by hoodlums. The woman invites the two back to her sister's manor, which is full of beautiful women…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko's aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel's lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs.
programme.sub-title: A Witch in the Fourth Dimension

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The great thief Nezumi-Kozou Jirokichi IV appears before Goemon and reveals that their ancestors competed in the first International Thieves Championship together, but were defeated by Lupin's grandfather, Arsène Lupin…
programme.sub-title: The Phantom Thief Rat Boy Appears

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The warden of an African prison is holding Fujiko captive. Lupin and his gang infiltrate the prison and attempt to break Fujiko out, but they become the target of the Iron Lizards, robotic devices developed to chase down fugitives!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Linda, a beautiful dancer, has stolen Jigen's heart and a vengeful Meyer has taken Fujiko hostage. Believing the women they love are in danger and unaware that Linda and Meyer are working together, Lupin and Jigen are set up to kill each other…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: According to legend, a stamp named the Cinderella Shadow is said to make its owner a princess. Lupin and his gang pull off the heist, but a girl name Alice who also wants the stamp tags along. Will the little girl get her royal wish?
programme.sub-title: Where did the Cinderella Stamp Go?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has sent a notice declaring he will steal all the cash from every bank in Paris. Detective Melon, the granddaughter of Inspector Garimard, is chosen to catch Lupin alongside Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has many secret techniques up his sleeve, and one of them is his Levitation Technique. In order to get their hands on this technique, a crime syndicate plots a dirty trick, where a fake Lupin tortures a man known as X8 and frames the real Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Inspector Zenigata get kidnapped and the two are forcibly conscripted into the Foreign Legion in Morocco. Lupin and Inspector Zenigata make a run for it, but not before they're shackled together at the neck.
programme.sub-title: The Wind in Morocco is Hot

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Beautiful Swedish twins, Latica and Anita, are engaged in a battle to the death over the Viking treasure map concealed on their backs. In disguise, Lupin learns the map's secret, but the map possesses an additional secret.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A hit has been ordered on Lupin and Puma, a formidable hitman who specializes in long-range attacks, is on his trail! Lupin takes his chances with a close range, one-on-one showdown against Puma, but the plan seemingly backfires and Lupin is shot…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Orion's Crown has been stolen and is up for grabs at a black-market auction. Lupin has his eyes on both the crown and the auction money, but first he must outsmart the other parties vying for the crown, including Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A two-thousand-year-old casket has been excavated. Inside the casket is Camilla, a beautiful woman in a near-death state, holding a golden statuette of the Virgin Mary. Lupin attempts to steal the golden statuette, but things don't go as planned…
programme.sub-title: Lupin Who Turned into a Vampire

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are attending a party in Africa, waiting for an opportunity to snatch a rare black pearl. However, their plan goes awry when a gang of gorillas crashes the party and steals the black pearl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Massive riches have been hidden inside Tsukikage Castle. Lupin and his gang must decipher a code to find out the whereabouts of this great treasure. Wii Lupin be able to locate the treasure before his rivals do?
programme.sub-title: Uncover the Secret of Tsukikage Castle

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen head to Mongolia in search of Genghis Khan's treasures. Meanwhile, Goemon is visiting his ancestor's grave to pay his respects when he encounters Fujiko, who is in search of Yoshitsune Minamoto's buried treasure.
programme.sub-title: The Hidden Gold of Genghis Khan

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The ICPO chief promises to erase Fujiko's criminal record in exchange for her cooperation in arresting Lupin. Up against an ego-bruised Inspector Zenigata and a determined Fujiko, have Lupin's heisting days come to an end?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen sneak on board a ship smuggling diamonds. However, what they find on board are several thousand chickens! Lupin and his gang infiltrate the Hong Kong smuggling boss's lair where diamonds are being illicitly sold…
programme.sub-title: Diamonds Disappeared Under the Sky of Hong Kong

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal a suitcase containing Costa Rican diamonds, but the contents turns out to be Inspector Zenigata. The real diamonds are being shipped to Puerto Rico inside a missile and Lupin must find out the precise launch time to intercept it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion.
programme.sub-title: Search for the Treasure of Princess Kaguya

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman…

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Robocop, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) -- a loving husband, father and good cop -- is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Marlon Brando and Jack Nicholson ignite the screen in this rousing story of a wealthy Montana rancher who hires a professional killer to track down a gang of horse thieves.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: The Animal, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe cop suffers a horrible car accident, and is repaired by a mad scientist who uses animal parts. Problems arise when the animal parts begin to take over.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards, (2000, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: An unhappy dentist in Montreal gets a new neighbor, Jimmy 'The Tulip' Teduski, a former mob hitman turned informant with a price on his head.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Man of the House, (2005, Screwball)
programme.desc: A hard-edged Texas Ranger goes undercover to protect a group of college cheerleaders after they witness a murder.

programme.title: Head of State, (2003, Political Comedies)
programme.desc: When Washington desperately needs a presidential candidate just weeks before the election, they need someone sure to lose. They pick Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), an unknown local politician from a down-and-out D.C. neighborhood, to be their puppet.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Every story and battle from the first half of the season comes crashing together in this action-packed, emotional mid-season finale.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick faces new difficulties after a battle; the fight continues in other communities as core members face hard decisions.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Groups unite their forces and converge on the Hilltop; Aaron and Enid search for allies; Simon takes matters into his own hands.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl finds himself in bad company as his group heads to the Hilltop; Maggie makes difficult decisions at the Hilltop; Gabriel's faith becomes tested.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Daryl Dixon's arrival to France sets off a violent chain of events that inadvertently puts a young boy at the heart of a growing religious movement in danger; Daryl agrees to help shepherd the boy to safety in exchange for help returning to America.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Daryl, Isabelle, Laurent and Sylvie face trouble on the road; Isabelle remembers the day the hungry ones appeared; Laurent struggles to fit in.

programme.title: The group arrives in Paris, where Isabelle confronts her past while growing closer to Daryl; Codron seeks help from the leader of a growing nationalist movement called Pouvoir, putting the Union of Hope and Laurent under dangerous scrutiny.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Daryl and Isabelle must negotiate with Quinn, the proprietor of the underground Demimonde club, the last vestige of art and expression in Paris.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Daryl faces old demons, recalling the circumstances that landed him in France; Isabelle's sacrifice forces her to consider drastic measures; Genet commences a celebration for the people of Paris.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Genet ensures to strengthen her base of power; Daryl has a job to do before he can go back to America.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Carol maps a path toward Daryl that forces her to confront her past; Daryl, Isabelle, and Laurent struggle to define their roles at the Nest, under the watchful supervision of Losang; Daryl and Nesters launch a rescue mission for Fallou and Emile.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: La Gentillesse Des Étrangers

programme.title: Carol and Ash take an unexpected detour during their journey to find Daryl; Daryl, Isabelle, and Sylvie uncover a dark new threat at the Nest. Losang's faith is tested.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Moulin Rouge

programme.title: Carol's hunt for information leads her to dangerous places and a new set of horrors; Daryl, Isabelle, and Fallou race to save one of their own; Pouvoir regroups.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon

programme.title: Pouvoir attacks the Nest and Losang and Isabelle confront each other.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Le Paradis Pour Toi

programme.title: Old friends and enemies realign in surprising ways as a new faction of survivors from the Nest and Pouvoir hunt down Laurent; Daryl struggles to forgive himself and Carol's lies come to a head.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Vouloir, C'est Pouvoir

programme.title: An exit strategy is charted from France; the Rooftop Community helps map a new plan for the future.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.sub-title: The Book of Carol: Au Revoir Les Enfants

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls In Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that she’s gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.
programme.sub-title: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo brings home a pet Chanela. Shingo becomes so absorbed in the Chanela that he stops going to school, which worries Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Scent of a Monster: Chanela Will Steal Your Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru dream of becoming famous like Mikan Shiratori. When the girls hear that Mikan is hosting a talent contest, they see their chance.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the school’s smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.

programme.sub-title: The Curtain is Raised! The Cursed School Fine Arts Festival...

programme.title: Ghost Stories

programme.desc: Laila visits incredible colleges, art galleries & restaurants in the Carolina Core, North Carolina.

programme.title: The Nightcap
programme.desc: Exploring provocative topics with an open mind and a cocktail in hand.

programme.title: Divorce Court
programme.desc: Ernest feels like he’s being strung along in his relationship and questions his fiancée’s commitment.

programme.title: Divorce Court
programme.desc: Aimee says her fiancée’s actions, since they’ve been engaged, have led her to believe she has a secret lover.

programme.title: Divorce Court
programme.desc: Kali says her fiancé, Omar, sold her on a dream of marriage and having a family which turned out to be a lie.

programme.title: Divorce Court
programme.desc: Joyce is in dire need of a DNA test to save her marriage.

programme.title: We Sound Crazy
programme.desc: We Sound Crazy Podcast with special guest Jacquees

programme.title: We Sound Crazy
programme.desc: We Sound Crazy Podcast with special guest Jacquees

programme.title: Portia

programme.title: Portia
